title: Spectacular Lease with Right to Purchase Opportunity
posting_body: My name is Andre Jones, and I am a Licensed Real Estate Broker with Skyline Properties.
I am working with an Investor that is offering an amazing Lease with Right to Purchase program.
With this program, you are essentially able to choose a home that is currently listed for sale, we purchase it, and then lease it to you!
No Gimmicks, No Scam, just an amazing opportunity for you to choose your next home.
It gets even better!
We give you up to 5 years “First Right of Refusal”
What’s that mean?
It means no one can tell you, that you have to move, because they are “Selling” the home.
Our hopes are that you fall in love with the home and eventually decide to purchase!
As long as you meet the qualifications for the program, we can move forward with
Finding a home that works for YOU and YOUR FAMILY!
This is a fantastic program, that I would love to share with you!
Call me today!
show contact info
or visit my website <URL> and click the leasing tab to be directed to our website that allows you to register and apply for the program!
There is a video that goes over how program works as well!
I look forward to working with you to place you and your family in the home you deserve!!!
Andre' Jones
Managing Real Estate Broker
Skyline Properties, Inc – Puyallup Branch
702 S. Hill Park Rd, Suite 203
Puyallup, WA 98373
